SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowCount, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT EVENT_ID AS eventId , EVENT_SE AS eventSe , EVENT_NM AS eventNm , EVENT_PURPS AS eventPurps , EVENT_BGNDE AS eventBeginDe , EVENT_ENDDE AS eventEndDe , EVENT_AUSPC_INSTT_NM AS eventAuspcInsttNm, EVENT_MNGT_INSTT_NM AS eventMngtInsttNm , EVENT_PLACE AS eventPlace , EVENT_CN AS eventCn , CT_OCCRRNC_AT AS ctOccrrncAt , PARTCPT_CT AS partcptCt , PSNCPA AS psncpa , REFRN_URL AS refrnUrl , RCEPT_BGNDE AS rceptBeginDe , RCEPT_ENDDE AS rceptEndDe , to_date(EVENT_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD')-to_date(EVENT_BGNDE,'YYYYMMDD')+1 as eventTemp1 , (select count(atdrn.APPLCNT_ID) from COMTNEVENTATDRN atdrn where atdrn.EVENT_ID = A.EVENT_ID) as eventTemp2, (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM053' and code = A.EVENT_SE) as eventTemp3 FROM COMTNEVENTMANAGE A WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_SE like '%'||#{searchSe}||'%'
AND #{searchKeyword} BETWEEN SUBSTR(A.EVENT_BGNDE, 0, 6) AND SUBSTR(A.EVENT_ENDDE, 0, 6)
AND A.EVENT_BGNDE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND EVENT_NM like '%'||#{searchNm}||'%'
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE rowCount > #{firstIndex} AND rowCount <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNEVENTMANAGE WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_SE like '%'||#{searchSe}||'%'
AND #{searchKeyword} BETWEEN SUBSTR(EVENT_BGNDE, 0, 6) AND SUBSTR(EVENT_ENDDE, 0, 6)
AND EVENT_BGNDE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND EVENT_NM like '%'||#{searchNm}||'%'

SELECT mge.EVENT_ID AS eventId , mge.EVENT_SE AS eventSe , mge.EVENT_NM AS eventNm , mge.EVENT_PURPS AS eventPurps , mge.EVENT_BGNDE AS eventBeginDe , mge.EVENT_ENDDE AS eventEndDe , mge.EVENT_AUSPC_INSTT_NM AS eventAuspcInsttNm, mge.EVENT_MNGT_INSTT_NM AS eventMngtInsttNm , mge.EVENT_PLACE AS eventPlace , mge.EVENT_CN AS eventCn , mge.CT_OCCRRNC_AT AS ctOccrrncAt , mge.PARTCPT_CT AS partcptCt , mge.PSNCPA AS psncpa , mge.REFRN_URL AS refrnUrl , mge.RCEPT_BGNDE AS rceptBeginDe , mge.RCEPT_ENDDE AS rceptEndDe , to_date(mge.EVENT_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD')-to_date(mge.EVENT_BGNDE,'YYYYMMDD')+1 AS eventTemp1 , (select count(*) from COMTNEVENTATDRN a where a.EVENT_ID = mge.EVENT_ID) AS eventAtdrnCount, TRUNC(to_date(mge.RCEPT_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD')-SYSDATE) AS eventDayCount, (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM053' and code = mge.EVENT_SE) AS eventTemp3 FROM COMTNEVENTMANAGE mge WHERE EVENT_ID = #{eventId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNEVENTMANAGE (EVENT_ID , EVENT_SE , EVENT_NM , EVENT_PURPS , EVENT_BGNDE , EVENT_ENDDE , EVENT_AUSPC_INSTT_NM, EVENT_MNGT_INSTT_NM , EVENT_PLACE , EVENT_CN , CT_OCCRRNC_AT , PARTCPT_CT , PSNCPA , REFRN_URL , RCEPT_BGNDE , RCEPT_ENDDE , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES (#{eventId} , #{eventSe} , #{eventNm} , #{eventPurps} , #{eventBeginDe} , #{eventEndDe} , #{eventAuspcInsttNm} , #{eventMngtInsttNm} , #{eventPlace} , #{eventCn} , #{ctOccrrncAt} , #{partcptCt} , #{psncpa} , #{refrnUrl} , #{rceptBeginDe} , #{rceptEndDe} , #{frstRegisterId} , sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNEVENTMANAGE SET EVENT_PURPS = #{eventPurps} , EVENT_BGNDE = #{eventBeginDe} , EVENT_ENDDE = #{eventEndDe} , EVENT_AUSPC_INSTT_NM = #{eventAuspcInsttNm}, EVENT_MNGT_INSTT_NM = #{eventMngtInsttNm} , EVENT_PLACE = #{eventPlace} , EVENT_CN = #{eventCn} , CT_OCCRRNC_AT = #{ctOccrrncAt} , PARTCPT_CT = #{partcptCt} , PSNCPA = #{psncpa} , REFRN_URL = #{refrnUrl} , RCEPT_BGNDE = #{rceptBeginDe} , RCEPT_ENDDE = #{rceptEndDe} , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate WHERE EVENT_ID = #{eventId} AND EVENT_SE = #{eventSe}
